actions.name: Claws (True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage. If the grimalkin moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the target makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The grimalkin has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
